page.title: 05RIVER AVON, STRENSHAM, 3.
page.content:
Erosion, caused by boats exceeding the speed limit, and pollution are damaging the habitats and the lives of birds and animals.{Swans}are rare though one family has been reared this summer. The lead weights used by the anglers are blamed for the deaths of many swans.
{Kingfishers}are returning and the {marsh warbler}nests on its banks. {Herons}are present but several have recently been shot. {Mallards}and particularly{moorhen}have suffered from the depredations of mink, though deliberate attempts have been made to eradicate these intruders.
